item.title: 235. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Search Tree
item.description: Link: https://leetcode.com/problems/merge-two-sorted-lists/ Status: done Solution: two pointer Code: binary search class Solution: def lowestCommonAncestor(self, root: 'TreeNode', p: 'TreeNode', q: 'TreeNode') -> 'TreeNode': cur = root while cur: if cur.val > p.val and cur.val > q.val: cur = cur.left elif cur.val < p.val and cur.val < q.val: cur = cur.right else: return cur dfs - without binary search info - “236. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Tree” class Solution: def lowestCommonAncestor(self, root: 'TreeNode', p: 'TreeNode', q: 'TreeNode') -> 'TreeNode': if root == p or root == q or not root: return root left = self.
